entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 a.m. MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
